item.title: Can You Spell 'Catalytic Converter'? Take This Quiz to Find Out!
item.description: Introduction to the Catalytic Converter Quiz Are you familiar with the term ‘catalytic converter’? Do you know what it does and why it’s important? Take this quiz to find out! What is a Catalytic Converter? A catalytic converter is a device that is installed in the exhaust system of an internal combustion engine. It works to reduce the emissions of harmful pollutants from the engine. The converter does this by converting the pollutants into less toxic gases before they are released into the atmosphere.
